double_jeopardy.clue_text:
(Sarah of the Clue Crew presents the clue on a monitor.)  An angel stands pointing to show that you don't have to go to the underworld in Joachim Patinir's

This Springsteen song mentions "suicide machines sprung from cages out on Highway 9, chrome wheeled, fuel injected"

of this Old Testament
patriarch's dream
is in the collection
